I'm a software engineer, currently pursuing my Computer Science B.S. as a senior at UCLA. I've done two internships at Microsoft and Veritas, and am acting project lead for Micromouse at the IEEE UCLA Student Branch. For a professional summary, you can check out my resume.

Other than software, I enjoy playing ultimate frisbee, exploring the outdoors, reading, and occasionally writing.
